title: Project Management - Resource Scheduling
description: A project manager needs to schedule technicians for the various tasks in a newly approved project.

tasks.description: Review the project plan to identify the required skills and hours for each task.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM has a clear list of resource requirements.

tasks.description: Check the resource scheduling tool for technician availability and skill sets.
tasks.expected_outcome: The PM identifies which technicians are available and have the right skills (e.g., networking, server admin).

tasks.description: Assign technicians to the project tasks in the scheduling tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project is fully resourced, and technicians can see their assigned tasks.
